name: Scheznyki
description: The Scheznyki is a small fey creature embodying chaotic evil with a formidable presence. It possesses striking features and a long beard, making it visually distinctive.
memorable: Its unique weakness to having its beard cut off disables its powerful spellcasting ability, contrasting its formidable combat capabilities.
goals: To sow chaos and engage enemies in battle using both melee and magic.
relations: Associated with other chaotic fey and magical creatures.
environment: Found in forested or magical areas, often hidden from view.
strengths: Strong melee attacks enhanced by its Brute ability, along with robust magic resistance.
weaknesses: Vulnerable if its beard is cut off, which disables its spellcasting.
attacks: Utilizes a War Pick for melee attacks and an Arcane Bolt for ranged strikes, dealing substantial damage.
most_powerful_ability: Can cast various spells like Dispel Magic and Hold Person, making it a versatile combatant.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in complete darkness as if it were dim light.
additional_information: Has advantage on saving throws against spells
Can turn invisible until it attacks or casts a spell
Spellcasting ability based on Charisma with a DC of 14
Can cast various supportive and control spells daily
spellcasting: Can cast spells at will or multiple times a day, providing utility and battlefield control.
test_queries: fey with powerful spells and melee strikes
creature vulnerable when its beard is cut
